headline: SCHIFF FAVORS HOME FOR JEWISH CULTURE; Fears Freedom in New Democracies May Breed Indifference to Ancient Teachings. STILL OPPOSES ZIONISM Sounds Note of Patriotism in Address to Great Meeting of the League of Jewish Youth. AIMS OF THE NEW LEAGUE. Hopes to Preserve Ancient Faith and Teachings of the Jews. ZANGWILL BACK TO ZIONISM. Sees Hope for Jewish State in Palestine if Turks Are Beaten.

headline: U-BOATS DESTROY 2 HOSPITAL SHIPS; KILL 15 GERMANS; Donegal and Lanfranc Are Sunk Without Warning, 75 Men in All Perishing. PRUSSIANS RUSH FOR BOATS Beg on Their Knees to be Saved as British Wounded Stand at Attention, Singing. MARKINGS BEING REMOVED England Abandons Prescribed Insignia Which Now Only Make the Ships Plainer Targets. Prussian Guardsmen in Panic. Wounded Show Bravery. Markings Invited Attack. U-BOATS DESTROY 2 HOSPITAL SHIPS Military Measures Adopted. Germans Now Put Aboard.

headline: WAR-MAD PASTOR A SUICIDE AFTER KILLING 2 WOMEN; Murders Wife and Her Mother and Wounds Sister-in-Law, Following Long Argument. THE WOMEN ALL GERMANS Rev. Dr. Berry, an American, Often Inflamed by Family's Support of the Kaiser. SPARES SLEEPING CHILDREN Pistol Bought Under Pretext That It Was Needed in His Duties as a Home Guard. Long Mentally Ill. Dies Without Awakening. PASTOR A SUICIDE AFTER KILLING TWO BERRY'S CAREER. Had Preached in the Beecher Memorial Church, Brooklyn.

headline: GERMAN SOCIALIST BID FOR PEACE; Overtures Made to Pacifists in Russian Council of Workmen's and Soldiers' Deputies. DEMAND REFORM AT HOME Military Control of Munition Factories as Result of Strike Is Imminent. Demand a Free Germany. GERMAN SOCIALIST BID FOR PEACE Aim Special Appeal to Russians. MILITARY LAW TO END STRIKE. Workers' Ordered to Return to Factories or Be Called to Colors. URGE HUNGRY TO "HOLD OUT" Berlin Paper Appeals to Germans Not to Give In Now. WANT NO GERMAN CHILDREN. Suggestion That Denmark Care for 15,000 Evokes Strong Dissent.
